name: XL power armor
description: This is a DoubleTech power armor that has been modified to include the mutated site. Mk.I is a basic power armor and heavyweight suit. It boasts very high protection against attacks, but it is difficult to move. If you prefer to use the built-in power supply for your suit, you can save the UPS power for other tools. All DoubleTeck power armors need to be in direct contact with the skin for control and thermal conditioning.
